about_the_game:
Ravenwood is a rogue-like survival game with some RPG aspects, survive as long as you can. Grow stronger for every run and advance in the realms of Ravenwood.

BATTLE THE REALMS

As the heroic protector of Ravenwood, you'll explore a vast, enchanting worlds filled with mystical creatures, realms and ancient secrets. Armed with powerful magic, you'll vanquish the forces of darkness and face ever-evolving challenges. Experience dynamic gameplay as you harness the full power of ancient spells, farm for gold, and strengthen your hero through every victory and defeat.

MYSTICAL POWERS

As you gain experience and level up, you'll unlock the ability to upgrade your spells, enhancing their power and versatility. Experiment with different combinations and discover new ways to harness your magical abilities. With every playthrough, you'll encounter different challenges and opportunities, ensuring a fresh and unique experience each time you dive into the Realms.

MADE FOR REPLAYABILITY

With replayability in mind, no two expeditions are ever the same. Before setting out on your next run, you can visit the village merchant. There, you can purchase powerful upgrades and unique items to bolster your hero's abilities. Strategize, enhance your skills, and prepare for the unknown as you dive back into the ever-evolving realms of Ravenwood. Will you rise to the challenge and uncover all the secrets hidden within? The choice is yours!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 processor or later
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Play as a hero fighting off enemies in the forest. Advance and learn new abilities to become stronger, but so will the enemies. Can you survive the mystical creatures of Ravenwood?
